What book is The movie Ant-Man based on?

The movieAnt-Man is based on the bookAstonishing Ant-Manwritten byÂ  Stan Lee

Astonishing Ant-ManPublished by Marvel Comics Group - 1/1/2002

After testing an experimental formula on himself, biochemist Hank Pym found himself reduced to the size of an insect and attacked by an army of ants. Inspired by his experience, Hank devised a cybernetic helmet that would allow him to communicate with ants via psionic waves, and embarked on a crimefighting career with an army at his command. This black and white volume collects the early adventures of Ant-Man, conceived the comics' legends of Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.

Related books / From the author(s)

Astonishing Ant-Man

written byStan Lee

Published by Marvel Comics Group - 1/1/2002

After testing an experimental formula on himself, biochemist Hank Pym found himself reduced to the size of an insect and attacked by an army of ants. Inspired by his experience, Hank devised a cybernetic helmet that would allow him to communicate with ants via psionic waves, and embarked on a crimefighting career with an army at his command. This black and white volume collects the early adventures of Ant-Man, conceived the comics' legends of Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.

Astonishing Ant-Man

written byStan Lee

Published by Marvel Enterprises - 1/1/2002

After testing an experimental formula on himself, biochemist Hank Pym found himself reduced to the size of an insect and attacked by an army of ants. Inspired by his experience, Hank devised a cybernetic helmet that would allow him to communicate with ants via psionic waves, and embarked on a crimefighting career with an army at his command. This black and white volume collects the early adventures of Ant-Man, conceived the comics' legends of Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.

Marvel Comics Digest

written byStan Lee

1/1/2018

A mix of old and new comics about Ant-man, The Wasp, and the Avengers.

Ant-Man and the Wasp

written byStan Lee

1/1/2017

The Marvel Platinum

written byStan LeeandRoy Thomas

5/8/2015

He's the smallest hero in the Marvel Universe... and the biggest. When Hank Pym discovered 'Pym particles' he found he could shrink down to the size of an ant but still had the strength of a normal man! Utilising his a helmet that allowed him to control ants he became Ant-Man, and one of the founding members of the Avengers. In his time, Pym has given up the mantle and passed it to Scott Lang. Now discover Ant-Man's greatest secrets!

Did you know that the movie Ant-Man is based on the book Astonishing Ant-Man?

Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, con-man Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats. Against seemingly insurmountable obstacles, Pym and Lang must plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
